In the multiplication problem below, $ A$, $ B$, $ C$ and $ D$ are different digits. What is $ A + B$?\\
\begin{tabular}{cccc}
 & A & B & A\\
$\times$ & & C & D\\
\hline 
C & D & C & D\\
\end{tabular}\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 1 \qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ 2 \qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 3 \qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ 4 \qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 9$
